text: KJRT (88.3 FM) is a radio station broadcasting a religious radio format. Licensed to Amarillo, Texas, United States, the station is currently owned by the Kingdom Keys Network. KJRT's programming is also heard on six other full powered stations. KJRT also has seven low-powered translators throughout the Texas panhandle, and one in Elk City, Oklahoma. ==External links== JRT JRT
title: KJRT
